hadiths.text: Abbad b. 'Abdullah b. Zubair reported that 'A'isha ordered the bier of Sa'd b. Abu Waqqas to be brought into the mosque so that she should pray for him. The people disapproved this (act) of hers. She said:How soon the people have forgotten that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) offered not the funeral prayer of Suhail b al-Baida' but in a mosque
